item.description:
Paws Walk 2012 will take place at Stratham Hill Park in Stratham, NH on Sunday, June 10, 2012!

Paws Walk is fun with a purpose. Walkers raise critically important funds for the care of approximately 3,000 homeless animals that the New Hampshire SPCA takes in each year.

We encourage each walker to raise at least $250 - because if just 500 walkers each raise $250, we will raise $125,000 in online donations alone!

A link to the Paws Walk website: http://pawswalk.kintera.org/faf/home/default.asp?ievent=1010245&lis=0&kntae1010245=42E1392C389441379067DE703F49926B

I have set up a Human Soles and Doggie Paws team on the Paws Walk website.  Cost is $20 whether you register as an individual or a team member, this registration fee is to attend the event and is charged by the NHSPCA and is paid online through their website.

Of course as many of us can sign up to go as want to at any time and even pay your registration fee the day of the event in person.

When you register online you also get to pick the size shirt you want. To register on their home page click on register than register as a team member and pick our team as the one you want to be a part of.

The address of 277 Portsmouth Ave., Stratham, NH puts you at the NH Community Technical College parking lot on the opposite side of the road 0.2 miles from the park entrance.  We will walk from the college parking lot over to the park as a group.  It will be easier to find parking at the college as opposed to closer to the park.

If you don't plan on going or doing any fundraising for this event as a team member please consider making a donation to the team as a whole  online by clicking on this link:

http://pawswalk.kintera.org/faf/donorReg/donorPledge.asp?ievent=1010245&lis=0&kntae1010245=73AC1A61E9B5438DAC39AC4B42CD8FEF&supId=0&team=5079432&cj=

Due to Paws Walk rules this is a leashed event while participating in Paws Walk activities.
item.how_to_find_us: Driving from Exeter towards Stratham on NH-33 (Portsmouth Ave.) you pass Sandy Point Road opposite the park entrance. Go 0.2 miles and turn left into the parking lot for the college. Meet on the grass near the entrance.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Paws Walk 2012 - Stratham Hill Park - Stratham, NH
